official_title: To amend the Klamath River Basin Fishery Resources Restoration Act to increase the number of members of the Klamath River Basin Fisheries Task Force.

summary.text: Amends the Klamath River Basin Fishery Resources Restoration Act to require that one member of the Klamath River Basin Fisheries Task Force be appointed by the Commissioners of Klamath County, Oregon.

titles.title: To amend the Klamath River Basin Fishery Resources Restoration Act to increase the number of members of the Klamath River Basin Fisheries Task Force.
